Title: Long live chairman Mao! Long, long live!
Designer: Shanghai Fine Arts Academy Work Propaganda Team, Revolutionary Committee (上海市美术学校工宣队, 革委会)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: People on Tiananmen Square in Beijing, waving Little Red Books. They are looking towards the balcony where Mao appears a few times every year, for the commemoration of the proclamation of the People's Republic on 1 October, or Labor Day on 1 May.
